General.Name: Maquia Capital Acquisition Corporation Warrant
General.Description: Maquia Capital Acquisition Corporation focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus its search on technology-focused middle market and emerging growth companies in North America. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 50 Biscayne Boulevard, Miami, FL, United States, 33132
